title: How do I reset my password if I forget it?
content: If you forget the password for a note, you will not be able to access the note. It's important to remember your passwords as they are used to encrypt and decrypt individual notes.

title: How does PaperBit encrypt my notes?
content: PaperBit uses AES-256 encryption to securely store your notes. Each note is encrypted with a unique numeric password provided by the user.

title: Can I backup my notes?
content: Currently, PaperBit does not support any backup functionalities. Please ensure you remember the content and passwords for your notes, as there is no way to backup the data at this time.

title: Is there a limit to the number of notes I can create?
content: There is no limit to the number of notes you can create in PaperBit. The only limitation is the available storage space on your device.

title: How can I export my notes?
content: Currently, PaperBit does not support exporting notes. All notes are stored locally on your device without any export functionality.

title: How secure is PaperBit?
content: PaperBit is highly secure. It uses AES-256 encryption to store notes, and each note is protected by a numeric password provided by the user. Ensure your passwords are strong and not shared with others.

title: How do I change the password for a note?
content: To change the password for a note, you will need to create a new note with the new password and manually transfer the content from the old note.

title: Can I sync my notes across multiple devices?
content: Currently, PaperBit does not support syncing notes across multiple devices. All notes are stored locally on your device.

title: What should I do if the app crashes?
content: If the app crashes, try restarting your device and opening the app again. If the issue persists, please contact our support team for assistance.

title: How can I contact support?
content: You can contact our support team by emailing deepakpk009@yahoo.in. We aim to respond to all queries within 24 hours.

title: What should I do if I enter the wrong password?
content: If you enter the wrong password, the app will not be able to find the corresponding note file. Make sure you enter the correct numeric password associated with your note.

title: How can I create a new note?
content: To create a new note, simply enter a new numeric password when prompted. If no file exists with that password, a new note will be created for you to write in.
